Alok_LET'S GET FKD UP.lyrics summary: The song portrays a wild and carefree attitude towards having a good time, inviting listeners to let go of inhibitions and indulge in the freedom of losing control.
Alok_LET'S GET FKD UP.lyrics sentiment: Positive because the lyrics express a joyful and carefree attitude towards partying and letting loose.
Alok_LET'S GET FKD UP.music energy: High because the tempo is fast and the instrumentation is intense, typical of an EDM party anthem.
Alok_LET'S GET FKD UP.music danceability: High because the tempo and rhythm are designed to make people dance energetically, typical of a dance track.
Alok_LET'S GET FKD UP.valence: High because the tone is uplifting and focused on having a good time.
Alok_LET'S GET FKD UP.mode: Major because the melody and chord progression give a bright and resolved tonal quality.

Ely Oaks_Spectrum (Say My Name).lyrics summary: A call to action or a plea for recognition, as suggested by the title 'Spectrum (Say My Name)', indicates themes of identity and acknowledgment.
Ely Oaks_Spectrum (Say My Name).lyrics sentiment: Mixed because the phrase 'Say My Name' can imply both assertiveness and a desire for validation or emotional connection.
Ely Oaks_Spectrum (Say My Name).music energy: High because Hypertechno music typically features intense sounds and fast tempos.
Ely Oaks_Spectrum (Say My Name).music danceability: High because Hypertechno is designed to be rhythmic and club-oriented, encouraging dancing.
Ely Oaks_Spectrum (Say My Name).valence: Medium because while the genre often includes uplifting beats, the call for recognition could add an introspective layer.
Ely Oaks_Spectrum (Say My Name).mode: Minor because Hypertechno frequently employs electronic minor scales for an intense and edgy sound.

NO EMOTION_Wings (Techno).lyrics sentiment: Neutral because there are no lyrics to convey any emotional content.
NO EMOTION_Wings (Techno).music energy: High because the tempo is fast and the genre typically involves intense beats.
NO EMOTION_Wings (Techno).music danceability: High because techno is characterized by a strong, consistent rhythm that encourages dancing.
NO EMOTION_Wings (Techno).valence: Medium because techno can have a repetitive melodic structure that is neither distinctly happy nor sad.
NO EMOTION_Wings (Techno).mode: Minor because the chords Em, C, G, D suggest a progression starting in E minor, which gives a slightly dark and moody feel typical of techno.

Nicolas Julian_Mask Off.lyrics sentiment: Neutral because this track has no lyrics, only musical elements.
Nicolas Julian_Mask Off.music energy: High because the track has a fast tempo of 155 BPM and is described as high energy.
Nicolas Julian_Mask Off.music danceability: High because the track has a strong, fast tempo and is categorized under dance music, making it highly danceable.
Nicolas Julian_Mask Off.valence: Medium because while the song is energetic and danceable, it is described as somber which might balance the emotive content to a more neutral level.
Nicolas Julian_Mask Off.mode: Major because it is in the key of D Major, which typically sounds bright and resolved.

cass\u00f6_Prada (feat. D-Block Europe).lyrics summary: The lyrics discuss themes of luxury and wealth, including taking a lady shopping, selling bricks, and flying to new destinations.
cass\u00f6_Prada (feat. D-Block Europe).lyrics sentiment: Mixed because the lyrics convey excitement about luxury and wealth but also imply illegal activities which adds a darker tone.
cass\u00f6_Prada (feat. D-Block Europe).music energy: High because the remix nature tends to involve energetic beats and intense production.
cass\u00f6_Prada (feat. D-Block Europe).music danceability: High because the track peaked on dance charts, indicating a strong and driving beat suitable for dancing.
cass\u00f6_Prada (feat. D-Block Europe).valence: Medium because while the subject matter is upbeat in terms of wealth and luxury, there is an underlying tension from the mention of illegal activities.
cass\u00f6_Prada (feat. D-Block Europe).mode: Major because the overall bright and celebratory tone is typical of tracks aiming for dance hits.
